trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory uses the SAML 2.0 protocol to enable applications to provide a single sign-on experience to their users.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory uses the SAML 2.0 protocol to enable applications to provide a single sign-on experience to their users.

trans-unit.source: This document describes the behavior of the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This document describes the behavior of the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: These <newTerm>SAML profiles</newTerm> explain how SAML assertions, protocols, and bindings are used in the identity provider service.
trans-unit.target: These <newTerm>SAML profiles</newTerm> explain how SAML assertions, protocols, and bindings are used in the identity provider service.

trans-unit.source: This section includes the following topics:
trans-unit.target: This section includes the following topics:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="590b6fd4-d6c7-43db-b6fa-c03f2718ea2e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Application Registration and Metadata Exchange</link> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure Active Directory and applications provide to each other to enable federation.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="590b6fd4-d6c7-43db-b6fa-c03f2718ea2e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Application Registration and Metadata Exchange</link> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure Active Directory and applications provide to each other to enable federation.

trans-unit.source: The metadata includes tenant-specific and tenant-independent metadata endpoint for single sign-on and single sign-out.
trans-unit.target: The metadata includes tenant-specific and tenant-independent metadata endpoint for single sign-on and single sign-out.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="ea9b3d8c-f582-469f-9335-ae7edf098f0c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single Sign-on (SAML Protocol)</link> - Learn about the SAML 2.0 <system>AuthnRequest</system> and <system>Response</system> elements that Azure Active Directory uses to enable single sign-on.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="ea9b3d8c-f582-469f-9335-ae7edf098f0c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single Sign-on (SAML Protocol)</link> - Learn about the SAML 2.0 <system>AuthnRequest</system> and <system>Response</system> elements that Azure Active Directory uses to enable single sign-on.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="c0f0b28b-13bc-4bbd-a07e-a088796127b4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single Sign-out (SAML Protocol)</link> - Learn about the SAML 2.0 <system>LogoutRequest</system> and <system>LogoutResponse</system> elements that Azure Active Directory uses to enable single sign-out.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="c0f0b28b-13bc-4bbd-a07e-a088796127b4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single Sign-out (SAML Protocol)</link> - Learn about the SAML 2.0 <system>LogoutRequest</system> and <system>LogoutResponse</system> elements that Azure Active Directory uses to enable single sign-out.

trans-unit.source: Profiles for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) V2.0 (PDF)
trans-unit.target: Profiles for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) V2.0 (PDF)
